mapper.sql: flowId, nickname, operateUser, createTime, notes, functionValue, result
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_OPERATION_LOG (flowId, nickname, operateUser, createTime, notes, functionValue, result) VALUES
(#{item.flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.functionValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
